title: Google Pixel 2 bricked after recent update
content:
I am currently in the beta program and when I updated to the most recent security patch, my phone no longer boots properly after restarting. I get stuck at the Google logo with a loading bar just continuously loading... Its been over an hour now and I've followed every possible solution to try and fix it. Hard restarts, plugging in, safe mode, etc.

How do I contact Google about my phone and getting it fixed? This is a little upsetting.
